channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Columbia University Interim president stepping down, university says
item.description: Columbia University Interim President Katrina Armstrong is stepping down, according to the university.

item.title: Close call between Delta flight, Air Force jet near Reagan National
item.description: The incident occurred just after the Delta Air Lines flight had taken off from Reagan National Airport.

item.title: Death toll in Myanmar earthquake nears 700, with hundreds more injured
item.description: It sent buildings in many areas toppling to the ground, buckled roads, caused bridges to collapse and burst a dam.

item.title: Judge blocks dismantling of CFPB, orders employees reinstated
item.description: The judge's order requires the Trump administration to reinstate terminated CFPB employees among other steps.
